lead_paragraph: King Felipe VI asked the leader of the Socialist party, Pedro Sánchez, to try to form a coalition government and break Spain’s political deadlock after inconclusive elections.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Spain: Socialist Aims to Form Coalition
headline.main: Spain: Socialist Aims to Form Coalition

snippet: King Felipe VI asked the leader of the Socialist party, Pedro Sánchez, to try to form a coalition government and break Spain’s political deadlock after inconclusive elections.
abstract: King Felipe VI of Spain asks Socialist party leader Pedro Sanchez to form coalition government in effort to break country's political deadlock after inconclusive elections in December 2015.
